# Ignore the Library folder (contains cached data)
Library/

# Ignore the Logs folder (contains log files)
Logs/

# Ignore UserSettings folder (contains local settings)
UserSettings/

# Ignore ProjectSettings folder (optional, but useful to ignore some settings)
ProjectSettings/

# Ignore build results (optional, but commonly ignored)
Build/
Builds/

# Ignore temporary files generated by Unity
Temp/
